name: PumpKing (Shxdz)
description:
Once upon a time, there was a cowboy farmer who had a gift for growing beautiful pumpkins. One night, however, disaster struck! A pack of zombie creatures invaded his ranch, their hunger for pumpkins driving them to madness. Using your farming skills and quick reflexes, you must fend off the zombie invasion and prevent them from devouring all of your pumpkins.
How long can you save your crops and emerge victorious in the face of the undead? Play now and find out!

Key Features:
  • Frenetic shooting enemy wave game
  • Different guns to unlock
  • Immersive Sound Design
  • Volumetric lighting
  • Atmospheric ambience
Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Shift to sprint
  • Left/Right mouse click to shoot/aim
  • R to reload
  • E to use special abilty (once loaded)
  • H to toggle commands
